TopicTitle: Space Center already upgraded on new 64-bit save?

Articles.Content:
So I started a new save on 64-bit and the space center is the same as it's always has been and unupgradable.

When I start a new save on the 32-bit the space center is all Noobed out (which is what I want).

Is anyone else having this problem with new 64-bit saves?

Yes, it's a known bug with 64-bit and I don't know of any workaround.

See the unmodded support thread here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/103115-The-buildings-start-out-fully-upgraded-in-career-mode%21-Please-please-help%21
